title: CulturalBehaviorProfile
description: Behavioral dimension profile for a target region, used to drive UX adaptation decisions.

uncertainty_avoidance.description: Degree to which uncertainty and ambiguity are threatening. High = need for clear rules, guarantees, structured processes.

collectivism.description: Degree to which group harmony and social proof influence decisions. High = strong community/social validation needs.

authority_distance.description: Acceptance of hierarchical authority and expert endorsements. High = authority/expert signals are persuasive.

context_level.description: Communication context dependency. High = implicit communication preferred; Low = explicit, detailed information needed.

price_sensitivity.description: Degree of price-consciousness in purchase decisions. High = value framing and comparisons are important.

trust_need.description: Baseline trust requirement before purchase. High = more trust-building elements needed (guarantees, certifications).

friction_tolerance.description: Tolerance for steps/complexity in purchase flow. High = accepts more steps; Low = needs streamlined flow.

source.description: Source reference (framework name, report title, etc.)

description.description: Brief description of what this source supports

evidence.description: List of evidence sources supporting the dimension values

notes.description: Constraints, caveats, and limitations of this profile
